profile.description:
Developer in training. Passionate about technologies and computers.
I love video games, reading, music...
Always learning, always improving.

Theory is when you know something, but it doesn't work. Practice is when something works, but you don't know why. Programmers combine theory and practice: Nothing works and they don't know why.

courses.first-course-description: Public Education. Integrated 2-year course for multiplatform app developing.
courses.second-course-description: Integrated course about HTML5, CSS3 and JavaScript for Web Developing.

experience.first-job-description: Various projects for adquiring experience. Development for family and friends.

hobbies.hobbies-description: I love traveling and discovering new places and cultures. My last trip was a 3-Month language course in Tokyo, Japan.
hobbies.hobbies-description2: Located in a small neighbourhood in Tokyo, Nogata is a living residential area full of shops and restaurants.
hobbies.hobbies-description3: I also feel very relaxed and satisfied when mounting and painting Warhammer Miniatures.

projects.first-project-description: Personal project about condensing all my knowledge into a well-built App being usable in Android and Apple environments. In adition to a series of books and extra material for teaching.
projects.second-project-description: My own, customizable and modular portfolio for showing all the projects, skills and experiences I've been accumulating during my career.
